FuncDef: This command configures the tertiary DNS server for DNS name resolution. The tertiary DNS server is used only if the primary DNS server and the secondary DNS server do not respond.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the IP or IPv6 address of the tertiary DNS server. Values-ipv4-address|a.b.c.d, ipv6-address|x:x:x:x:x:x:x:x[-interface], |x:x:x:x:x:x:d.d.d.d[-interface], |x: [0 to FFFF]H, |d: [0 to 255]D, interface|32 chars max, for link local addresses.
